name: Sonus Spiritus
description:
De-stress, relax, chill out, breathe easy, hang loose, lie down, loosen up, mellow out, breathe in, put your feet up, recline, rest, settle back,breathe out, take a break, take it easy, unwind, sleep, wake up, yawn, stretch, move, work, play, love.

Three beautiful guided relaxation and meditation tracks from the composer of Ami Tomake Steve Luck and holistic therapist Caroline Cogdon.

name: Ami Tomake
description:
A 60 minute relaxation CD composed in accordance with both musical and scientific principles. 
Ami Tomake meaning 'I love you' is a traditional Bengali lullaby. 
The soothing lullaby vocal melody is accompanied by lush orchestral strings, harp and solo flute. The tempo matches that of the resting human heart rate and the music is arranged in a gently lilting ¾ time signature.
This CD is can be helpful in promoting restful sleep and it is also perfect as an accompaniment to a range of complementary therapies.

name: The Ami Tomake Suite
description: The Ami Tomake Suite’ has been produced in response to demand for a purely instrumental version of the original CD. It features the beautiful flute work of Tom Lovatt, more to the fore, playing the melody of the lullaby as well as an extended arrangement containing new musical material not included in the original Ami Tomake.

name: Ami Tomake Deluxe Edition
description:
Ami Tomake’ the soothing lullaby vocal melody is accompanied by lush orchestral strings, harp and solo flute. The tempo matches that of the resting human heart rate and the music is arranged in a gently lilting ¾ time signature. ‘Ami Tomake’ features sublime vocals from acclaimed singers Eloise Hodder and Lesley Roley.
‘The Ami Tomake Suite’ has been produced in response to demand for a purely instrumental version of the original CD. It features the beautiful flute work of Tom Lovatt, more to the fore, playing the melody of the lullaby as well as an extended arrangement containing new musical material not included in the original Ami Tomake.

name: Sonus
description:
A CD album of breathtaking beauty, composed to sooth and relax from the composer of ‘Ami Tomake’. Beautiful melodies and shimmering washes of sound elevate your spirits and lift your mood.
Perfect as an accompaniment to a range of complementary therapies or simply to help you to relax.
